channel.title: Fluid AWESOME Sink - Game crash
channel.description:
Hi!
So lately I had issues with Fluid AWESOME Sink mod crashing the game on startup (after splash, not getting to main menu). I have eliminated all other options and it is only due to the Fluid AWESOME Sink mod. It doesn't seem to be related to some other mod (inter-mod compatibility), but just problematic on it's own.
I've got a crash report but couldn't attach it here.

item.title: Fluid AWESOME Sink - Game crash
item.dc:creator: @ZviHantsis Zvi Hantsis
item.description:
@ZviHantsis wrote:

Issue solved with current update.

Read full topic
